name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou WPK - Gunshinkourinsu Scenario
summary: Additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou with Power Up Kit". Kagetora Uesugi, later known to become Kenshin Uesugi the God of War, arrives at a battle shattered Echigo. Relive the historical drama of the ambitious expedition the young hero sets out to.
